statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT username FROM user_accounts WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, email, registration_date FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' AND last_login IS NULL ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, username, email, last_login FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND registration_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY last_login ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT session_id, created_at FROM sessions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT password FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';

SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT session_id, user_id FROM sessions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE display_name ILIKE 'John%';
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE expiration_date < NOW();
SELECT user_id, display_name, avatar_url FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, email, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, up.display_name, up.avatar_url FROM users u JOIN user_profiles up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE up.bio IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE expiration_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT display_name, profile_picture_url FROM user_profile ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%' AND email LIKE '%com' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE granted_on BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_profile ON users.user_id = user_profile.user_id WHERE user_profile.display_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT username, email, date_joined FROM users JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id WHERE session_start > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY date_joined DESC;

SELECT users.username, user_profile.display_name, user_sessions.session_start FROM users JOIN user_profile ON users.user_id = user_profile.user_id JOIN user_sessions ON users.user_id = user_sessions.user_id WHERE user_sessions.session_end IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email, permission_level FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id WHERE permission_level > 2 ORDER BY permission_level DESC, username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT email, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT display_name, avatar_url FROM player_profiles WHERE xp > 100
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE login_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT display_name, avatar_url, xp FROM player_profiles WHERE xp > 1000 ORDER BY xp DESC;
SELECT session_id, session_token, user_id, login_time FROM user_sessions WHERE logout_time IS NULL;
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_message FROM user_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
